title: Fides Catholica De Mysterio SS. Trinitatis, Sive Trium Personarum Divinarum In Uno Deo
creator: Roberus, Paulus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Roberus, Paulus: Fides Catholica De Mysterio SS. Trinitatis, Sive Trium Personarum Divinarum In Uno Deo  Ex utroq[ue] Testamento, tam Vetere quam Novo, Luculenter ac firmiter demonstrata, Nec non Ex omnibus seculis primitivae Christianae Ecclesiae comprobata, ut & Ab omnivariis hostibus vindicata. Wittebergae  Berlin
publisher: Röhnerus  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
